meta.title: RSTA Sample Question Bank
meta.description: Sample questions for radio/telephone communication training
meta.author: RADStrat Team

questions.scenarioPrompt: You are Bowser One, a training aircraft. You need to request permission from ATC to taxi to runway 27.

expectedAnswer.text: ATC, Bowser One, request taxi to runway two seven. Over.
variants: ATC Bowser One request taxi to runway 27 over
ATC, Bowser One requesting taxi runway two seven, over

questions.scenarioPrompt: ATC has instructed you to hold short of runway 27. Acknowledge this instruction.

expectedAnswer.text: Holding short runway two seven. Over.
variants: ATC, Bowser One, holding short runway two seven. Over.

questions.scenarioPrompt: You didn't understand ATC's last transmission. Request clarification.

variants: ATC, Bowser One, request repeat. Over.

questions.scenarioPrompt: You are Bowser One and have been cleared for takeoff on runway 27. Acknowledge the clearance.

expectedAnswer.text: ATC, Bowser One, cleared for takeoff runway two seven. Over.
variants: Cleared takeoff runway two seven, Bowser One, over
Bowser One, cleared for takeoff runway 27, over

questions.scenarioPrompt: You are Bowser One at 5000 feet and need to report your position to ATC.

expectedAnswer.text: ATC, Bowser One, five thousand feet, over the field. Over.
variants: ATC, Bowser One, at five thousand feet, over
Bowser One, position report, five thousand feet, over

questions.scenarioPrompt: ATC instructs you to descend to 3000 feet. Read back the instruction.

expectedAnswer.text: Descending to three thousand feet. Over.
variants: ATC, Bowser One, descending to three thousand feet. Over.

questions.scenarioPrompt: You are Bowser One and wish to declare a PAN-PAN situation due to a minor engine issue.

expectedAnswer.text: ATC, Bowser One, PAN-PAN, PAN-PAN, PAN-PAN, minor engine issue, request priority landing. Over.
variants: PAN-PAN PAN-PAN PAN-PAN, Bowser One, engine issue, request priority, over

hints: State the nature of the issue

questions.scenarioPrompt: ATC clears you to land on runway 27. Acknowledge.

expectedAnswer.text: Cleared to land runway two seven. Over.
variants: ATC, Bowser One, cleared to land runway two seven. Over.

questions.scenarioPrompt: You have landed and vacated the runway. Report to ATC.

expectedAnswer.text: ATC, Bowser One, runway vacated. Over.
variants: ATC, Bowser One, clear of runway two seven, over

hints: Report that you have vacated/cleared the runway

questions.scenarioPrompt: You are ending communications with ATC for this session.

expectedAnswer.text: ATC, Bowser One, switching off. Out.

hints: Use 'Out' instead of 'Over' when ending communication
